title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project's requirements, including the desired features, user experience, technical specifications, and scalability considerations for the AI-generated literary universe. Ensure that the requirements cover the following aspects: narrative generation algorithms, user personalization and preference tracking, content moderation, user interface design, database architecture, and integration with third-party services (if any).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components for story generation, user interaction, and data management.

title: Develop AI Story Generation Engine
description: Implement the AI algorithms and models responsible for generating coherent and engaging narratives based on user preferences and choices.

title: Build User Interface and Interaction
description: Design and develop the user interface and interaction mechanisms for readers to explore and influence the generated stories.

title: Implement Data Management and Storage
description: Set up the database and data management systems to store and retrieve user preferences, story data, and other relevant information.

title: Establish Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement appropriate security measures to protect user data and ensure the system's integrity, including authentication, authorization, and encryption.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application to various environments.

title: Create Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and quality assurance plan to ensure the system's functionality, performance, and user experience meet the defined requirements.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Document the system's architecture, components, and APIs for future reference and maintenance purposes.
